attributes.title: I love this app daddy !!
attributes.review: First off let me begin by saying I am not racist by any means, but I’m proud of being white, so I have a lot of white Pride. This app downloaded for me real quick! Due to the fact that I have 5G tower right outside my Trailer home. I was going to register after I cut my hair but woke up and for some odd reason my hair had fallen off! I then panicked and reached for the only thing that would calm me down, my posted of half naked ripped abs daddy Trump , and of corse a cold ice Natural Light. Any who, I then reached for my brand new iPhone 4 and commenced to use the app, first thing it asked me was if I was Mexican, of course I say no, then it asked me if I was black, I said heck no, then asked if I like corn with mayonnaise , butter, and tajen (don’t know what that is) or if I like malt liquor, hot sauce and 2pac? I think those are trick questions ? Not sure though but of course I don’t like any of that, then it asked me if I like Kanye west and I don’t like his music but I love his fashion because my clothes is always full of holes so I feel like he understands Me, after I answered that question it was like I was let into a secret chat room or something, I then was asked about me sexual orientation, I was not so comfortable with that I told my sister that they were asking about our relationship, she didn’t like that much either so we left that blank but I think that was another question I answered right because after that it was almost like a bideo game, I was scoring more point then I was on my honeymoon night yeeeeehaaa!!! Anyway then it asked if I was wearing a mask while filling out my registration I had said yes, then told me to take it off cuz it’s not a law to wear one, so I did, and I was very happy cuz for some reason my mask always smells like doodoo, not sure why. The next day I wole up to the sounds of my awesome present telling me to wake up to held make America great again so I did, thanks daddy, I then continued to fill out my registration. It asked if I had a job, I said yes , it then said “your welcome” I was like wow! Thanks trump! After that it asked if I was winning on the app, I then said yes, it then said “I told you you’d get tired of winning “ my mind was blown!!! I can keep going , there so many things about this app that I love, shows you were to go, when to go and what to say when you need to go. Unfortunately I been feeling under the weather lately, not sure why might be due to when I was wearing the mask, but hopefully now that I do t wear it I’ll feel better.  Well hope y’all enjoy this as much as I did. Far well ..Trump 2020s
